title: Governor declares all-out war on criminals after banditsâ€™ attack on community
description: Bandits launched a bloody attack on Oke-Ode community, killing at least 15 people including vigilantes and villagers, injuring over 50, and forcing residents to flee.

title: Troops foil bandit attack on Benue communities, recover arms
description: Troops of Operation Whirl Stroke foiled a bandit attempt to attack communities in Katsina-Ala LGA, recovering arms in the process.
